document.full_text: as the uproar over zdeno chara's horrific hit on max pacioretty subsided on friday, the spotlight shifted back to the ice and whether it will ever again be business as usual for the national hockey league.
document.title: calm slowly returns to nhl as furor over chara hit fades
lines_and_colors: as the uproar over zdeno chara's horrific hit on max pacioretty subsided on friday, the spotlight shifted back to the ice and whether it will ever again be business as usual for the national hockey league.
